avalancheActivity.comment: The snowpack is mostly stable. In some places in the high alpine regions, especially on fresh drifts of blown snow, a small, clustered avalanche can be triggered under higher loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The danger of Avalanche is low.

snowpackStructure.comment:
There is little snow, and the peaks and ridges are in some places blown bare. In the high alpine regions, weak layers may be present in the Old snow cover.
On prominent Sunny slopes, the snow has been frozen off and then frozen over, forming a drift.

tendency.highlights: The weather on Sunday morning will be similar to Saturday afternoon. It will clear from the NW in the afternoon. There will be a strong E wind. Monday will be sunny in the morning, with more clouds in the afternoon. Above 1500 m it will be around -8 °C. Avalanche conditions will remain similar.

weatherForecast.comment: It will be clear in the morning. In the middle of the day, with a strengthening of the SE wind, it will become cloudy everywhere in the central mountains, except on the coastal side of the Alps. In the high alpine regions, there will be light, moderate SW winds in the afternoon. At 1500 m it will be around -5, at 2000 m around -8 °C.
